tossupQ:
ENERGY Multiple Choice Approximately what percentage of the energy need in the U.S. is 
currently met by biomass? 
 
W) 15% 
X) 10% 
Y) 4% 
Z) 1%
bonusQ:
ENERGY Multiple Choice Which of the following is an advantage of using biomass in the 
form of corn to produce ethanol? 
 
W) Using corn to produce ethanol means that the U.S. will no longer need to import petroleum-
based products 
X) Corn-based ethanol is more fuel efficient than gasoline 
Y) Corn-based ethanol production has little impact on water supply 
Z) Food for cattle is produced when corn grain is converted to ethanol
bonusA:
Z) FOOD FOR CATTLE IS PRODUCED WHEN CORN GRAIN IS CONVERTED TO 
ETHANOL

cross a white chicken with a black chicken. Which of the following phenotypes will you see in

X) The chicks will be more black than white 
Y) Each of the chicks will be black and white in about equal proportions 
Z) The chicks will be more white than black

PROPORTIONS

well?

IT WORTH DEVELOPING
